name: There is no "Eye" in Team
description:
"There is no 'Eye' in Team"

This is a limited edition of 50 signed & numbered gallery quality prints + 5 Artist Proofs (AP). 

The Print: A Gallery quality Giclée print on natural white, matte, Somerset Velvet paper. Each sheet is a heavy 250g, and is acid/linen free. The inks used are Epson K3 archival inks for rich resolution and permanence.

The original oil painting is 18" x 24" on masonite. This fan art is based on the original "all red bandana" ninja turtles from the 80's comic books. Too cool! :D 

All prints are locally produced in Albuquerque New Mexico and I personally quality check the printing of each one.

name: The Time Job - Tee Shirt
description: "The Time Job" - Firefly + Doctor Who tee-shirt • Six custom colors • Hand silk screened in the lovely town of Albuquerque, NM. The Men's Shirt: A classic Anvil "Soft style", 4.5 oz., 100% preshrunk ringspun cotton jersey knit t-shirt. Mens Sizing Chart. THe Women's Shirt: 4.2 oz., 100% combed and ring-spun cotton baby jersey knit t-shirt with Longer body length. PLEASE NOTE: The Women's is a "Baby Doll" style and run on the small side. Women's Sizing Chart. This shirt was featured on Tee Fury.com February 25th, 2013 and was SUPER POPULAR! I drew this! Design ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. All shirts are locally produced in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

name: "The Time Job" (Firefly + Doctor Who) limited edition prints
description: This Edition is currently SOLD OUT! However, another "open, unsigned, edition" is avilable in my Society6 store". "The Time Job" - Firefly + Doctor Who, Limited Edition Print Print Size: 14" x 18" image printed on 16" x 20" inch paper. Limited Edition Print: Edition of 50 hand signed & numbered by the Artist plus 10 Artist Proofs (AP). This original work was a 16" x 20" acrylic painting on canvas. The Print: A Gallery quality Giclée print on natural white, matte, Somerset Velvet paper. Each sheet is a heavy 250g, and is acid/linen free. The inks used are Epson K3 archival inks for rich resolution and permanence. All prints are locally produced in Albuquerque New Mexico and I personally quality check the printing of each one.

name: Doctor Who "They Hatin'" - Dalek Tee Shirt
description: The Doctor always hating, but he'll never catch the Daleks (riding dirty). Wear this shirt, insignificant human, and bow to the MIGHT of the Daleks! Show your Cult of Skaro Pride, or you will be EXTERMINATED! • Two exterminatin' colors! • Hand silk screened in the lovely town of Albuquerque, NM. The Shirt: A classic Gildan "Soft style", 4.5 oz., 100% preshrunk ringspun cotton jersey knit t-shirt. Adult Men & Ladiess: M, L, XL, 2XL Here is a handy Sizing Chart. This shirt was featured on Tee Fury.com July 25th, 2012 and was SUPER POPULAR! I drew this! Design ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved.

name: Infinite Bacon Shirt
description: The Shirt of Infinite Bacon! Who doesn't love bacon? Infinite bacon! Inspired by the stunning art of MC Escher and the pork product we all know and love. This shirt will make you infinitely stylish. This infinite design has five succulent colors, and is hand printed on a lovely electric Blue. Featured on seven of the top Bacon Blogs: Bacon Today, TheDailyBacon.com, BaconBuzz.com, Foodiggity.com, Bacon Nation.net, The Republique du bacon.com (French!) Bacon Bacon Bacon.com, and many others... Do you want to transform your pathetic, dull, inconsequential life into the magical one you have always dreamed of? A life that is wonderful, fulfilling, and extra crispy? Have YOU ever had that dream where you see yourself floating in a rainbow colored balloon with a gondola full of delicious candy bars over a magical river of unicorns? The answer to all of life mysteries is at hand. The answer my friends is Infinite Bacon. The Shirt: A Gildan "Soft style", 4.5 oz., 100% preshrunk ringspun cotton jersey knit t-shirt. Adult Men & Womens: S, M, L, XL, 2XL Here is a handy Sizing Chart. Artwork: ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: "The Plumber Strikes Back" shirt
description: "The Plumber Strikes Back" Tee Shirt A long time ago in a plumbing pipe far, far away... The Plumber Strikes Back - A mash up of galactic proportions. These are from the exact same print run that was from Teefury.com. There are three in each size. After these are gone... there may be no more. This shirt was featured on Teefury.com Monday Nov. 5 2012 and was "super popular"!

name: Buddha Bot Shirt - Mens/Unisex Blue
description: "Mr. Ohmz", Buddha Bot v6 Mens/Unisex lake blue shirt. Ohmmmzzz is where the heart is. Mr. Ohmz is programmed to bring you deep tranquility. You will catch all kinds of love from fellow Robot lovers and people rocking the Dharma in this little number. Mr. Ohmz is programed to bring you years of joy as your favorite new t-shirt. The Buddha Bot v6 is silk screened with six peaceful colors. The Shirt: A tranquil lake blue, Anvil Tee, Ringspun Cotton, Short Sleeve T-Shirt. Made from 100% Preshrunk combed ringspun cotton. Adult Mens/Unisex: S, M, L, XL This shirt was featured on Tee Fury.com Feb. 24th 2011 and had "Super Popular" sales! Artwork: ©2011 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: Z is for Zombie Shirt
description: Somewhere in the the world right now a Zombie is tasting brains for the first time. Ughh, Brains... Braaaaaiiiinnns!!! "Z is for Zombie". This artwork of the Zed kind is a beautiful merger of subtle graphic design with a 1960's comic book style. • Six creepy "undead" colors! • Hand silk screened by uninfected "living" artists in the lovely town of Albuquerque, NM. The Shirt: A ghoulish Gildan "Soft style", 4.5 oz., 100% preshrunk ringspun cotton jersey knit t-shirt. Adult Men & Womens: S, M, L, XL, 2XL Here is a handy Sizing Chart. This shirt was featured on Tee Fury.com Oct. 15th 2010 and had "Super Popular" sales! I drew this! Design ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved.

name: Che FC Shirt
description: So popular: Now on it's second printing! The revolution will be extra crispy! Did capitalism win?! Is Ernesto "Che" Guevara still skulking around and trying to bring The Man down from the inside!? We don't rightly know... but we love the Peoples Potato wedges with a side of Castro Cole Slaw. This shirt was featured on Tee Fury.com Oct. 1st 2010! ***U.S residents will get a shipping confirmation/tracking email once the order is mailed.**** The Peoples Shirt: Is a sturdy Anvil "Eco Friendly" recycled Tee. • 5.5 oz., 70% pre-consumer recycled cotton/30% recycled polyester. • Seamless rib knit collar. • Double-needle stitched neckline, sleeve and bottom hem. Adult "Unisex" sizes available: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL Here is a little video showing the printing process:Steve Lee printing the Che FC! Idea and Printing by Steve Lee. Artwork: ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: Buddha Bot Messenger Bag
description:
Mr. Ohmz Buddha Bot Messenger Bag

Mr. Omz is guaranteed to bring your personal items into a state of peace and tranquility. This is a  gorgeous 100% cotton denim blue canvas messenger bag emblazoned with Mr. Ohmz. Each bag is silkscreened by hand in the lovely desert of Albuquerque New Mexico U.S.. :D 

• 100% cotton canvas
• Enzyme-washed
• Adjustable cotton webbing shoulder strap
• Antique brass slider and D-ring
• Large flap with magnetic snap
• Side pockets and exterior and interior zippered pockets
• 16"W x 11 1/2"H x 4 3/4"D

name: Doctor Who "They Hatin'" - woodblock print
description:
The Doctor always hating, but he'll never catch the Daleks (riding dirty).

Frame and display this poster, insignificant human, and bow to the MIGHT of the Daleks! Show your Cult of Skaro Pride, or you will be EXTERMINATED!

• Edition of 20 hand pulled woodcut prints
• 11×14 inch overall, 9×12 inch block image
• Signed and numbered
• Oil-based ink on acid-free cotton rag paper (all archival materials)
• Laser etched woodblock plate, from my original drawing 
• This listing is for the print alone, polybagged and boarded.
• This exact artwork is also available as a T-Shirt in my shop! 
• Handmade in the lovely town of Albuquerque, NM.

First class shipping with careful packaging to ensure safe delivery.

Thank you! Now go get your geek on...

name: Minnie - The Undead Doughnut
description: Night of the Living Zoughnuts! Minnie - The Undead Doughnut, in Five horrifying colors! ------------------------------------------------ Pre Order: All Orders before Feb. 15th ship normally. Orders after Feb. 15th 2013 will ship in 30 days of purchase. ------------------------------------------------ This is a limited edition, hand painted, cast resin sculpture from an original made in polymer clay. Each one is meticulously hand painted by me. Each figure is signed and numbered on the bottom. Please note, each one is hand painted and small variations do occur, and how cute is that!? Title: Minnie the Undead Doughnut Medium: Acrylic paint on cast resin. 5" H, 4" W, x 4" D. Edition: 24 signed & numbered, plus 6 Artist Proofs (AP) Please Note: After these 24 are sold there will be no more painted, signed, & numbered. A select number of blanks will be available. Process: Here is a slideshow of the original sculpting process: Mr. Jimmies process Resin casting by Firewheel Casting, Albuquerque, NM.

name: Mr. Jimmies - The Undead Doughnut (Classic Pink)
description: Night of the Living Doughnuts! Mr. Jimmies - The Undead Doughnut (Classic Pink) Mr. Jimmies was a mild mannered doughnut, just doing his regular shift at the greasy spoon diner. One fateful night a police officer staggers in... green, incoherent, mumbling. Before Jimmies could get out a concerned "May I help you Sir!?" ... the officer chomped! Reeling back, bloodied and in shock, Jimmies realized his fate was sealed. The officer was one of the newly turned "undead".... To be continued... This is a limited edition, hand painted, cast resin sculpture from an original I made in polymer clay. Each one is meticulously hand painted by me, including all 104 sprinkles! Each figure is signed and numbered on the bottom. Please note, each one is hand painted and small variations do occur. For instance, each sprinkle color configuration will be slightly different. How unique and cute is that!? Title: Mr. Jimmies, the Undead Doughnut Medium: Acrylic paint on cast resin. 7" H, 7" W, x 4" D. Edition: 25 signed & numbered, plus 5 Artist Proofs (AP) Please Note: After these 25 are sold there will be no more signed & numbered. The mold and original sculpt will be destroyed. Process: Here is a slideshow of the original sculpting process: Mr. Jimmies process Resin casting by Firewheel Casting, Albuquerque, NM.

name: Buddha Bot v6 Sticker 3 Pack
description: Buddha Bot v6~ The nirvana of sticker goodness Ohmzzz is where the heart is. This Buddha Bot is programmed for serious tranquility. Now a gorgeous 4 in x 4 in Vinyl sticker. Sticks to pretty much anything. Makes everything more peaceful. Great for sticking on: • Laptops • Your favorite water Bottle • Cars & Trucks • Sketchbooks... get creative! Artwork: ©2011 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: Infinite Bacon sticker 3 pack
description: The Holy grail of stickerness - INFINITE BACON!! Inspired by the stunning art of MC Escher and the pork product we all know and love. These möbius stickers will make ANYTHING they stick to infinitely better! Get three magical, never ending bacon stickers for just $5 bones! Fashion tip: Stickers make great impromptu masks! Instantly become Infinite Bacon Man/Woman and fight crime! Capes not included. ;0) Artwork: ©2010 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: Che FC sticker 3 pack
description:
The revolution will be extra crispy!

CheFC Sticker 3 Pack

Did capitalism win?! Is Ernesto "Che" Guevara still skulking around and trying to bring The Man down from the inside!? We don't rightly know... but we do love the Peoples Potato wedges with a side of Castro Cole Slaw. 

Get three CheFC stickers for just $5 bones and spread la revolución!

Viva la honey mustard!!

Idea and Printing: Steve Lee.

name: Z is for Zombie Sticker 3 Pack
description:
"Z" is for Zombie Sticker 3 Pack

Sure they are undead... but they are STILL sticky! This artwork of the Zed kind is a beautiful merger of subtle graphic design with a 1960's comic book style. Each sticker is full "undead" color!

Great for sticking on:
• Laptops 
• Your favorite water Bottle
• Cars & Trucks
• Sketchbooks... get creative!

Artwork: ©2011 by John Sumrow, all rights reserved. I drew this!

name: The Stalemate - Fine Art Print
description:
The Stalemate - two rooks & one creative drought
Print Size: 9" x 12" image printed on 11" x 14" inch paper.
Limited Edition Print: Edition of 25 Hand signed & numbered by the Artist. (Currently no. 6 will ship)

This piece is about the itch of "wanting" to paint VS the confusion as to "What" to paint. I chose to illustrate these two conflicting thoughts with bickering crows. The result is the inevitable stalemate that follows.

This original work was done with a Pentel brush pen filled with sumi ink, and colored with watercolors. There is a small touch of traditional airbrush in there as well for smooth shadows. :D

The Print: A Gallery quality Giclée print on natural white, matte, Somerset Velvet paper. Each sheet is a heavy 250g, and is acid/linen free. The inks used are Epson K3 archival inks for rich resolution and permanence.

All prints are locally produced in Albuquerque New Mexico and I personally quality check the printing of each one.

name: Buddha Bot v5 - Art Prints
description: Buddha Bot v5 - Art Prints My "Buddha Bot v5 painting is now a Gallery quality print programed to bring you peace and tranquility. The Print: A Gallery quality Giclée print on natural white, matte, Somerset Velvet paper. Each sheet is a heavy 250g, and is acid/linen free. The inks used are Epson K3 archival inks for rich resolution and permanence. The image is custom trimmed with 1" border, perfect for framing. Print Size: Large 13" x 13" image printed on 14 inch square paper. All prints are locally produced in Albuquerque New Mexico and I personally quality check the printing of each one.

name: Z is for Zombie - Art Prints
description: Z is for Zombie - Art Prints The "Z is for Zombie" illustration is now a gallery quality print reanimated from the dead to spend an eternity terrorizing your wall! The Print: A Gallery quality Giclée print on natural white, matte, Somerset Velvet paper. Each sheet is a heavy 250g, and is acid/linen free. The inks used are Epson K3 archival inks for rich resolution and permanence. The image is perfectly trimmed and fits into an 11" x 14" frame. Print Size: 11" x 14" image and paper size All prints are locally produced in Albuquerque New Mexico and I personally quality check the printing of each one.

name: Z is for Zombie - hand colored print
description: Somewhere in the the world right now a Zombie is tasting brains for the first time. Ughh, Brains... Braaaaaiiiinnns!!! Here it is my latest illustration: "Z is for Zombie". This artwork of the Zed kind is a beautiful merger of subtle graphic design with a 1960's comic book style. Name: Z is for Zombie - Hand Colored Medium: Black Serigraph (Silk Screen) hand colored with Acrylic Ink. Size: 11" x 14" The line art is one color: black, hand silk screened on 180 lb. acid free Strathmore Bristol board. Each print is then customized and hand colored with Acrylic Ink. The colors are airbrushed and hand brushed on to achieve a unique atmosphere and style. Please Note:No two prints are the same! There are only two left. the next customer will be buying No. 3 of 4. There are only four in existence. One went to a good friend, these three I am selling online are it. After they are gone, there will be no more.

name: Z is for Zombie - B&W Print
description: Somewhere in the the world right now a Zombie is tasting brains for the first time. Ughh, Brains... Braaaaaiiiinnns!!! Here it is my latest illustration: "Z is for Zombie". This artwork, of the Zed kind, is a beautiful merger of subtle graphic design and a 1960's comic book flair. Name: Z is for Zombie B&W Print Medium: Black Serigraph (Silk Screen) customized with hand Ink work Size: 11" x 14" These are one color, black, hand silk screened prints. Each print is on 180lb. acid free Arches Bristol board. This artwork uses the exact same line art screen as my Z is for Zombie t-shirt. Each print is customized with black archival ink to achieve a half print / half drawing effect. Please note:Each one is unique. No two prints are the same! There are only two of these in existence. Once they are gone there will be no more.
